resources.string: \ Android Blockbreaker is another remake of a classic arcade game. It was created by four Computer Science undergrads - Gabe Pike, Blake Fischer, Eric England, and Robert Morning - as a final project at Cal State University Bakersfield. It is open source, free to distribute and modify as long as credit is given.
\ The goal is the break all the bricks!\n\ Control the paddle with your finger and keep the ball from hitting the bottom.\n\ You only have one chance, so if your ball hits the bottom, you die!
